message: I'll buy it, but I'm not sure what I'm getting myself into.
I'll pass, but I'm glad I got a good one in the first round!
I'm not taking the risk of wasting another million dollars.
I'm hoping to get lucky again!
Two for two, I'm on a roll!
Three high-quality ones in a row is probably a fluke, I'm not counting on it continuing.
I'm due for a good one, right?
Four for four, I'm on fire!
I'm starting to think Alice has a crystal ball, but I'll take it anyway!
Five for five, I'm starting to think this is a guarantee of some sort!
Six for six, I'm going to start thinking about buying the rest of her inventory!
Seven for seven, I'm on a roll, but I'm starting to wonder if this is just a streak of bad luck for Alice...
Eight for eight, I'm starting to think I should just buy all her products and sell them for a profit!
Nine for nine, I'm starting to think I should just take over Alice's business
Ten for ten, I'm on a hot streak, but I'm starting to wonder when the law of averages is going to catch up to me
Eleven for eleven, I'm starting to think I'm in a high-quality product bubble, but I'm not complaining!
Twelve for eleven, I think I've been spoiled for too long. Time to take a break from the streak.
I've been burned once already, I'm not taking the risk again.
Thirteen for twelve, I'm still on the right side of the odds, I think.
Fourteen for thirteen, I'm going out on a high note! Thanks for the game, Alice!
